DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Develop approach treat patient homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia use gene therapy autologous hepatocytes transduce normal low-density lipoprotein receptor gene .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Ex Vivo Liver-Directed Gene Therapy Familial Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Autologous hepatocytes obtain partial hepatectomy transduce recombinant retroviral vector contain low-density lipoprotein receptor gene . The transduced hepatocytes infuse via inferior mesenteric vein 3 day follow surgery . Traditional therapy discontinue 4 week prior protocol therapy may resume 6 week hepatocyte infusion .
